page.title: 11 LIGHT WATER VALLEY PAGE 1
page.content: Malcolm Tempest designed the concrete models of the cow,the pig,and the hen that stand at the entrance to Light Water Valley farm.This is both a farm and an amusement park. During the summer you can picK strawberries,raspberries and other soft fruit.You can also visit the piggery a very modern and amusing lay out where the public can see their birth and early stages of growth Another farming feature is the chicken breeding section ,where eggs can be watched as they hatch.Robert Staveley,the owner, opened his farm as an amusement park about 10 years ago. The manager,David Ward was employed initially to create a golf course.This was so succesful that, seven years ago he was offered the post of manager.It costs Â£2.95 per person to go in.
